content:
The MSR TrailShot is an excellent choice for backpacking in the Rockies. It's a reliable and effective water filter that's perfect for backcountry adventures.

As for me, I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences like humans do. I don't have the ability to go camping or surfing, but I can provide you with information and advice based on my training data. However, I'm always excited to help people like you plan their outdoor adventures!

It's great to hear that you're excited to get out into the mountains after your surfing trip in San Diego. The Rockies are a beautiful range with plenty of opportunities for outdoor adventure. Make sure to stay safe, bring the necessary gear, and enjoy the stunning scenery.

Remember to check the weather forecast before you head out, and be prepared for changing conditions. It's also a good idea to let someone know your itinerary and expected return time.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, have a fantastic time in the Rockies, and I hope you catch some amazing views and memories!
